name: Cooking Simulator Saved Game
summary: Learn about .CSSAVE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Cooking Simulator is a multiplatform cooking simulation game developed by Big Cheese Studio. PlayWay S.A. published the Windows version of Cooking Simulator in June 2019.
The Windows version of Cooking Simulator stores players' saved games in CSSAVE files. These files are located in the following directory:

description: A CSSAVE file is a saved game created by the Windows version of Cooking Simulator. It contains data that can be used to resume a player's in-progress game. Cooking Simulator automatically creates a CSSAVE file; players can also manually create them from the game's ESC menu.

instructions: You can use a CSSAVE file to resume the saved game it contains in Cooking Simulator (Windows). To do so, place the file in the following directory:
Then, open Cooking Simulator and use the ESC menu to load the saved game your CSSAVE file contains.
